description: Officials want to know if a bar in Ischgl failed to report a coronavirus case.
title: Coronavirus: Austria investigates Ischgl ski resort business for 'hiding case'
title_page: Coronavirus: Austria investigates Ischgl ski resort business for 'hiding case' - BBC News
maintext: The resort in Ischgl - a small town of about 1,500 people in the Austrian Alps - is known for its nightlife and annual concerts after the close of its ski season.
